about_the_game:
Have the great artwork and music of the game!

Artwork

60 high resolution images await you in this package. Includes naked, half-naked and clothed versions of the girls.

Music

In .wav format with the highest quality.

1) Hey Hey Now! - 02:12
2) Don't Ever Again - 01:53
3) Deep-tee-dee - 01:58
4) Curiosity Bell - 02:19
5) Have Some Interest - 01:57
6) Come On Finish It - 02:09

You can find the content inside the installation folder.

content_descriptors.notes: This product includes adult only nudity content.
